item.description:
This place is awesome if you are into classic movies on dvd. Everything from Charlie Chaplin, Orson Welles and comedies like Laurel & Hardy, Abbott & Costello etc etc to some newer movies.
The coffee bar has a good coffee selection and some delicious cookies, pastries, etc.

Here is the website http://www.bestvideo.com

I look forward to seeing some Coffee Talkers there.
item.name: Best Video and Coffee Bar In Hamden
